html:
12.12.18  11:13 am   How can I learn to hear the inner voices more clearly in dense harmonies (like sax soli or whatever) without confusing myself? I mean, how to mentally separate the lines

     it probably won't sound like separate coherent lines, but if you want to get stronger at hearing harmonies, just transcribe it. use brute force, unpause-pause, hunt and peck method. you will gradually get stronger and start to learn many interesting things about life as you go

12.12.18  10:50 am   What would Beyonce do?

     songs/music? and dancing?

12.12.18  10:49 am   What would you do if you knew you could not fail?

     succeed!

12.12.18  10:49 am   What is a good font

     password

12.12.18  10:07 am   Do you draw?

     sort of

12.12.18  9:43 am   How to not get in the way of the song?

     learn how it goes ...... sing it

12.12.18  9:21 am   washing dishes takes time, and resources. using disposable dishes fills landfills. what is better, in your opinion?

     how about something recyclable

12.12.18  8:12 am   when clocks were first invented, did the people who invented them guess what minute it was or did they know the exact time somehow? what do you think?

     they made it up!

12.12.18  7:03 am   Do you believe the notion that nice guys finish last?

     it depends when they start

12.12.18  5:59 am   I just watched a video of yours and I'm confused. Please help me understand what's going on here

     you'll need to help me understand a bit, by saying which video it was

12.12.18  5:55 am   I'm becoming increasingly frustrated with the fact that every time i try to write a song it always ends up with 3/4 or 12/8 time signature. not that those are bad time signatures, it's just that I want to write in a variety of time signatures, not just those two. any tips?

     record some looping 16th note percussion and listen to it all day?

12.12.18  5:23 am   In what place is the right place

     'here'

12.12.18  5:16 am   How come you get so many people asking about motivation and related subjects?

     i don't know

12.12.18  4:51 am   Is there a preferred order for us, the listener, to listen to your songs?

     no

      Chronologically? Seeing as you are very single driven, have you some sort of album structure in mind to a group of your songs?

     no

12.12.18  2:00 am   what is the right metric to measure 'weirdness'?

     dollars

12.12.18  1:58 am   I feel like I need to unravel my entire brain and wind it back up in a way that makes sense. Ya get me?

     yes

12.12.18  1:13 am   When it comes to the meaning of your songs, do you think that your original intent should matter at all when it comes to other people's interpretations?

     no but it can

12.12.18  12:35 am   What makes life possible

     you

12.12.18  12:21 am   When answering questions, do you consciously try to have a consistent ratio of serious answers to jokey random answers or are all your answers simultaneously jokey, random, and serious?

     i try to give the viewer an experience they will want to blog about at the water cooler

12.11.18  11:59 pm   What two digit number represents your personality best?

     99

12.11.18  11:11 pm   Is anything normal, natural, or sacred anymore?

     same as ever

12.11.18  10:40 pm   what's your favorite part about life

     figuring out how it works

12.11.18  7:19 pm   do you hate evil?

     it just doesn't seem believable

12.11.18  7:08 pm   hoq do you get ideas for songs

     they usually hit me in the face when i least expect. the secret is to develop fast enough reflexes to catch them

12.11.18  6:57 pm   you use the word 'and' too much in youra lyrics

i think

     i don't think i use it enough. i am going to use it more. here are some more ands while you wait

12.11.18  6:53 pm   what goes on in your head on the daily 

     how to get the work done on time

12.11.18  6:44 pm   Red or blue?

     i wonder if you can combine the 2 somehow

12.11.18  6:41 pm   Is the argument "Make music before you criticize some one else's "valid? Like, in any kind of creative media, do you think that critics should first know the difficulties of the creative process before proceeding to pass judgment? 

      i would prefer to make my own criticism first before criticizing other criticism

12.11.18  6:34 pm   Is ignorance realy bliss?

     i'm not sure

12.11.18  6:33 pm   What is your purpose in life?

      design a spatula flipper

12.11.18  5:51 pm   what did i ask last time? i forgot

     this

12.11.18  5:40 pm   How much piano practice do you do nowadays? 

     practice? forget that, i say do it for real!

12.11.18  5:14 pm   how to make a good melody

     make patterns and break them

12.11.18  4:57 pm   ahhhh why doess it alwasy feel like my brain is falling apart

     the entire universe is falling apart. that's how it was made

12.11.18  4:26 pm   What's your favourite bird?

     bee

12.11.18  3:41 pm   When did you realize that you snapped and went into overdrive?

     it has happened at various times. sept 2008. june 2010. sept 2012. jan 2014. oct 2016. sept 2018. other times too

12.11.18  3:37 pm   Have you thought of remastering/rerecording some of your older songs

     yes but it's not nearly as important as recording new ones

12.11.18  3:35 pm   how come "how to win at spelling" is dated to October 18th on your website?

     because that is when it was completed

12.11.18  3:27 pm   Do you want to or plan to do more interviews?

     yes

      Why or why not.

     to get much much much much much better at it

12.11.18  2:51 pm   So, before this website, where could one listen to all those old songs from like 2010? I mean, your tumblr... anywhere before that?

     you would have to get a CD from one of your friends if they had it

12.11.18  2:20 pm   is the new music video coming out next week?

     yes

12.11.18  2:17 pm   do u support communism

     i am giving them a 5 dollar monthly allowance. that will have to be enough

12.11.18  2:03 pm   It's weird being. Ever think about how weird it is to be? On the daily, I stop and am like holy f*** what is this why is this. Life is weird

     that's true, but i can't imagine it any other way

12.11.18  1:30 pm   are you interested in art museums?

     sure

      like would you want your videos to be shown in them?

     it almost seems like it would be better to utilize the physical space a little bit more than just a 2D video playing on a screen

12.11.18  12:30 pm   Why was the first video of YouTube was called "Die"?

     because that is the only word in the audio and video

12.11.18  12:24 pm   What are you going to do?

     hopefully everything

12.11.18  11:40 am   why is "how to win at spelling" dated 10.18.18 on the videos page? it was definitely not done, or released, at that date... or was it?

     done but not released on any of my sites or channels

12.11.18  11:10 am   Is god a snail?

     2 or 3 snails at least

12.11.18  10:48 am   So...if not on the videos page, where did you put the spelling one?

     on the videos page, and also the expert page

12.11.18  10:29 am   how to get rid of S E L F D O U B T

     practice doubting others
